content: Hello, I'm reaching out about the latest clinical trial results. Can you tell me more about the efficacy of the new drug?
I'd be happy to provide an update on the trial. The primary outcome measure was the percentage change in HbA1c levels.
That sounds interesting, but I'm not sure what specific data points were used to calculate this percentage change.
Let me check the appendix for more information. (appendix not included in this conversation history)
